attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned would like to see Compulsary National Srevice brought back to ALL residents after graduating from school / college - this would be for a minimum of 2 years.

This would help bring back respect, basic common sense and prevent a repeat of the recent riots seen in London and other cities.

In addition, it would give the youth of today opportunities to get a more robust and meaningfull way of life for future years.
